Everyone dies.

So will I, here is my will

Is it strange to have a webpage on the internet with your wishes after your death? I think so, but I now that it can be very handy if the people around you don't agree on the way your funeral will be or how your belongings will be distributed.

Cremation or burial?

Cremation. Your can flush my ashes in the toilet or place them somewhere nice, I don't care. Baking a cake with it will be super awesome of course.

The funny thing with cremations is that you still need a coffin. Please buy the cheapest one or build one yourself if you like that more.

Music

I like Seasons in the Sun of Terry Jecks at the moment, it will probably change later. What I like about it is the happiness, please remember the fun times and forget the bad ones ;-)

Belongings

I probably won't have money when I'm dead. So be careful.
